title: Art Project Starting Now
description:
Come join me on Patreon to participate in this new art project, and you can receive drawings, prints and postcards from what will be produced.   http://patreon.com/jonathanpageau

I am a professional icon carver, one of a handful of artists worldwide reviving a traditional art that was lost in the last century.  I carve full time on commissions for churches and individuals. I am an editor and contributor to the Orthodox Arts Journal, and also lecture on symbolism both on youtube and all over North America.

transcript_parts.text: hello everybody so as most of you know
although I do like talking about
symbolism most of my time I spend here
in my workshop carving icons and for the
last two years I've had a project where
I've been exploring the different forms
of icon carving through drawing now it's
been two years just this month in
November I sent out all of the stuff
that people who have been supporting me
or getting I'm sending out postcards I'm
sending out posters and also for people
who are giving at the twenty five dollar
level I'm sending an actual drawing that
I made and I was thinking to myself
where do we go now how could I make it
even more valuable and so what I decided
to do is rather to push it even further
this past year as many of you know
because of everything because of the
YouTube because of because the
conference's it has been a major year of
transition but through the fact that
people have been supporting me through

am ready to make a major transition in

I hired an assistant who is going to be
working with me in the workshop and one
of the things we want to do is of course
speed up my icon carving he'll be taking
out the backgrounds you know cleaning up
things doing the finishing through the
polishing doing all the kind of
preparatory work that I usually have to

it's going to speed up my production but
what it's also doing is freeing up some
time and some energy for me to explore

so this year for my development project

I will still be doing some drawings
maybe not as many but we will be with my
assistant together we'll be exploring

level
I've also acquired a kiln and the

the kiln
be playing around with that firing the
soapstone adding some glazes and so
there's a whole lot of things that we're
going to explore in the carving itself

out the subjects that I've been

types of imagery I want to explore the
whole history of early Western Byzantine
art doing some maybe fantastical beef
some ornamentation all kinds of new
images that hopefully will be appealing
to a wider audience and that might

now so what I'm going to do is I'm going

hopefully so it will create a more
exciting thing that you can follow on

new things we're going to develop we're

first pick
so exclusively for patrons I'm going to
put up these carvings on patreon so if

if I see that they're not going on

website and on social media but in the
last year what I've seen is every time I
